title: Thermodynamics - Internal energy from PV graph

content.question: In which state, if any, is the internal energy of the gas equal to the internal energy of the gas in State <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>?

choices.label: No other state, because all of the other states have different pressures and/or volumes

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
